Post.title: Build Your Own Blog  - Github
Post._content:
CSDN
******
	

<!--more-->

, ` :       ` [](https://www.godaddy.com/) [AWS](https://aws.amazon.com)[aliyun](www.aliyun.com) `H5+CSS+JS/AJAX` Swiftweb: ` :- hexo + github &  = ` 

![](https://cl.ly/022C2w20262o/commic_wow.jpg)

***  [Hexo](https://hexo.io/docs/)  [Github](https://github.com)  ***

## 

### Step.1 

 1. **Node.js** 	[](https://nodejs.org/en/download/package-manager/#osx)
 2. **Git** 		[](https://git-scm.com/book/zh/v1/--Git)
 3. 
 	```
	$ npm -v
	```
	```
	$ git --version
	```


### Step.2 GitHub

 1. `yourname.github.io`
 2.  **gh-pages** 
 	*  Reposity **Setting** 
 	*  **Automatic page generator**
 	
 ![](https://cl.ly/240P2i1D0b3j/hexo_1.png)
 
 3. : `yourname.github.io` ******
 ![](https://cl.ly/2L1R2X0e2j0U/comic_brilliant.jpg)
 
 
### Step.3 Hexo

 1. 
 2.  **Hexo**
 	```
	$ npm install -g hexo-cli
	```
 ---------------------------------------
## 
 
### Step.1 
1. 
	```
	$ hexo init <folder>
	$ cd <folder>
	$ npm install	
	```
### Step.2 
1. 
	```
	$ hexo g
	$ hexo s
	```
``INFO  Hexo is running at http://0.0.0.0:4000/. Press Ctrl+C to stop.````http://localhost:4000/``

![](https://cl.ly/1o0m2K121V18/hexo_2.png)

### Step.3 Github

1. 
```
git config --global user.name "yourname"
git config --global user.email "youremail"
```

2.  `_config.yml` 
```
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: git@github.com:yourname/yourname.github.io.git
  branch: master
```

3. 
```
$ hexo clean
$ hexo d
```

 ``INFO  Deploy done: git``  ``yourname.github.io``

![](https://cl.ly/441e3k3O1r2G/commic_yeah.jpg)


## 

### Q1: 
1. 
```
$ pwd
```
2.  `node.js` & `git` & `hexo` 

### Q2: Github Permission Denied
GithubSSHsshGithub[](https://help.github.com/articles/generating-an-ssh-key/) 



## 

1. 
```
$ hexo new [layout] <title>
```
2.  `/source/_posts/`  newblog.md 
3. 
4. 
```
$ hexo clean
$ hexo d
```





## 
**Hexo**  [Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/)

Post.title: Build Your Own Blog  - ()
Post._content:
***-*** 

<!--more-->



## 
### 
1.  [](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/wiki/Themes)  [NEXT](http://theme-next.iissnan.com) API
2. ` \themes `
3.  `_config.yml`  `themes` 

 ```
 theme: next //themes
 ```

### Scheme
Scheme  NexT  `Scheme` 

 * Muse -  Scheme NexT 
 * Mist - Muse 
 * Pisces -  Scheme

 ****`(/themes/next/_config.yml)` `scheme` 

    #scheme: Muse
    #scheme: Mist
    scheme: Pisces
   
### 
 ****`(_config.yml)``language` 

    language: zh-Hans
    
:

| Language | Code |
| -------- | ---- |
| English | en |
|  | zh-Hans |
| Franais | fr-FR |
| Portugus | pt |
|  | zh-hk  zh-tw |
|   | ru |
| Deutsch | de |
|  | ja |
| Indonesian | id |

### 
1. . ****`(/themes/next/_config.yml)``menu`. 

```
    menu_option : folder_directory
    (e.g.)
    categories : /categories
```
        
   
   
 ``` 
 	$ hexo new page "menu_option"
 	(e.g.)
   	$ hexo new page "categories"
 ```

    `/source/menu_optionindex.md` 
   
 ```
    ---
    title: menu_option
    date: 
    type: "menu_option"
    comments: false ()
    ---
    e.g.
    ---
    title: categories
    date: 2016-09-18 16:12:40
    type: "categories"
    comments: false
    ---
 ```
    
2. . ****`(/themes/next/languages/your_language_name.yml)``menu`

 ```
    menu_option : menu_name
    (e.g.)
    categories: 
 ```   
3. . ****`(/themes/next/_config.yml)``menu_icons` [Font Awesome](http://fontawesome.io) 

 ```
    menu_option : menu_icon_name
    (e.g.)
    categories: th
 ```
 
### 
1. ****`(/themes/next/_config.yml)``avatar`, 

 ```
    avatar: /images/avatar.png
 ```

2.  `avatar.png`  `(/themes/next/source/images)`

## 

****`(/themes/next/_config.yml)` ****`(_config.yml)` [](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/theme-settings.html) 



![](https://cl.ly/0k390e3v3z1v/comic_beautiful.jpg)

--- title: Build Your Own Blog - () tags: Hexo categories: "Blog" --- ***-*** ## ### theme [***DISQUS***](https://disqus.com) [******](http://duoshuo.com), **DISQUS** 1. **DISQUS** 2. **DISQUS**,shortname 3. `_config.yml` ``` # Disqus disqus_shortname: shortname ``` 4. [](http://morris821028.github.io/2014/04/12/web/hexo-comment/) ### `/themes/your_theme/layout/macro` `reward.swig` ``` {% if theme.alipay or theme.wechatpay %}
{{ theme.reward_comment }}
{% if theme.wechatpay %}

{% endif %} {% if theme.alipay %}

{% endif %}
{% endif %} ``` `post.swig`, `
` ``` {% if not is_index %} {% include 'reward.swig' %} {% endif %} ``` ****`(_config.yml)` ``` # Donate reward_comment: wechatpay: https://cl.ly/3W3I3O3t1622/wexinpay.JPG alipay: https://cl.ly/3t1O403j2P1F/alipay.JPG ``` ![](https://cl.ly/0a0n3y3t3136/comic_spiderman.jpg) ### RSS RSS $ npm install hexo-generator-feed --save ****`(_config.yml)`. P.S.`Next`****`(/themes/next/_config.yml)` ``` feed: type: atom path: atom.xml limit: 20 ``` ### ****`(/themes/next/_config.yml)``social` social_name: link_address e.g. GitHub: https://github.com/Millionaryearl Weibo: http://weibo.com/2334525960/profile?topnav=1&wvr=6&is_all=1 Personal: http://dukewei.typify.io [Font Awesome](http://fontawesome.io) social_name: icon_name (e.g.) GitHub: github Twitter: twitter Weibo: weibo Personal: home ### - `scripts`AddTail.js ``` // Filename: AddTail.js // Add a tail to every post from tail.md // Great for adding copyright info var fs = require('fs'); hexo.extend.filter.register('before_post_render', function(data){ if(data.copyright == false) return data; // Add seperate line data.content += '\n___\n'; // Try to read tail.md try { var file_content = fs.readFileSync('tail.md'); if(file_content && data.content.length > 50) { data.content += file_content; } } catch (err) { if (err.code !== 'ENOENT') throw err; // No process for ENOENT error } // , var permalink = '\n' + data.permalink; data.content += permalink; return data; }); ``` `tail.md` ### ***NEXT*** `/themes/next/source/js/src``particle.js` !function(){function n(n,e,t){return n.getAttribute(e)||t}function e(n){return document.getElementsByTagName(n)}function t(){var t=e("script"),o=t.length,i=t[o-1];return{l:o,z:n(i,"zIndex",-1),o:n(i,"opacity",.5),c:n(i,"color","0,0,0"),n:n(i,"count",99)}}function o(){c=u.width=window.innerWidth||document.documentElement.clientWidth||document.body.clientWidth,a=u.height=window.innerHeight||document.documentElement.clientHeight||document.body.clientHeight}function i(){l.clearRect(0,0,c,a);var n,e,t,o,u,d,x=[w].concat(y);y.forEach(function(i){for(i.x+=i.xa,i.y+=i.ya,i.xa*=i.x>c||i.x<0?-1:1,i.ya*=i.y>a||i.y<0?-1:1,l.fillRect(i.x-.5,i.y-.5,1,1),e=0;e=n.max/2&&(i.x-=.03*o,i.y-=.03*u),t=(n.max-d)/n.max,l.beginPath(),l.lineWidth=t/2,l.strokeStyle="rgba("+m.c+","+(t+.2)+")",l.moveTo(i.x,i.y),l.lineTo(n.x,n.y),l.stroke()));x.splice(x.indexOf(i),1)}),r(i)}var c,a,u=document.createElement("canvas"),m=t(),d="c_n"+m.l,l=u.getContext("2d"),r=window.requestAnimationFrame||window.webkitRequestAnimationFrame||window.mozRequestAnimationFrame||window.oRequestAnimationFrame||window.msRequestAnimationFrame||function(n){window.setTimeout(n,1e3/45)},x=Math.random,w={x:null,y:null,max:2e4};u.id=d,u.style.cssText="position:fixed;top:0;left:0;z-index:"+m.z+";opacity:"+m.o,e("body")[0].appendChild(u),o(),window.onresize=o,window.onmousemove=function(n){n=n||window.event,w.x=n.clientX,w.y=n.clientY},window.onmouseout=function(){w.x=null,w.y=null};for(var y=[],s=0;m.n>s;s++){var f=x()*c,h=x()*a,g=2*x()-1,p=2*x()-1;y.push({x:f,y:h,xa:g,ya:p,max:6e3})}setTimeout(function(){i()},100)}(); Post.title: Swift Notes - SDK
Post._content:
aws SDK
***SDK***

<!--more-->

 [](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/30072.html?spm=5176.doc30071.6.156.YoX0P8)  OC

![](https://cl.ly/hRAS/ExcuseMe.jpeg)

swiftSDKOCSwift

![](https://cl.ly/hREs/challenge-accepted-meme.jpg)



## Ready to work


---------------------------------------

### Step.1 - certificate

AppleAPNS***development certificate x1*** ***distribution certificate x1*** [](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/30071.html?spm=5176.doc30072.6.155.ItR8Ib) 


### Step.2 - AppKey, AppSecret 

appkey appsecret app

NPC - ***development certificate x1*** ***distribution certificate x1*** ***AppKey x1***, ***AppSecret x1***.

### Step.3 - App

App

![](https://cl.ly/hQyC/aliyun_1.jpeg)

 Post Notifications 

![](https://cl.ly/hRCF/aliyun_2.png)
### Step.4 - SDK

 build settings  Enable Bitcode  Build Phases  Link Binary With libraries : libz.tbdlibresolv.tbdCoreTelephony.frameworkSystemConfiguration.framework 

---------------------------------------

P.S. ~~~~

## Core Work

### Step.1 - 
 Header File YourProjectName-Bridging-Header.h  

![](https://cl.ly/hRGV/aliyun_3.jpeg)

 Build Setting Objective-C Bridging Header 

![](https://cl.ly/hRAR/aliyun_4.jpeg)

` #import <CloudPushSDK/CloudPushSDK.h>`, SDK

### Step.2 - 
APP

![](https://cl.ly/hRN5/aliyun_5.png)            
```



![](https://cl.ly/hR4P/aliyun_6.png)



![](https://cl.ly/hR86/aliyun_7.png)



![](https://cl.ly/hQrt/aliyun_8.png)



![](https://cl.ly/hQsX/PrettyGood.png)
